A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie should not have been released.  It lost all congruence with the prior film's plot lines and doesn't make sense.  Maybe it could have been saved in the edit room but I doubt it as the basic story was just so poorly written that it fails to be believable.  It's junk and it's the sole reason that SOLO failed at the box office.  That was fan backlash.
